website_summaries.verdict: Lower price point may mean lower-quality construction.
pros: Cute animal-print lining gives a fun feel kids will enjoy
Suede moccasins with upper textile liner, wool footbed
cons: Some reported construction was lower quality than other styles, but complaints came from adults who bought the product for themselves

customer_reviews.title: so I am very happy. They look cute too
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. He is very sensative, so I am very happy. They look cute too. They might be a half size smaller because of the thicker lining. I was expecting that so I definitely bought them even bigger than I usually do. With kids you have to let some room to grow!
customer_reviews.author: B. Lovely

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and warm
customer_reviews.text: Love them. I bought them for myself, I wear a women's 7.5. I would say I have a narrow foot. They fit snuggly, but comfortably. They are soft, comfortable, cute, and sturdy. Will probably wear them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Perf
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in the Toddler (1-4 years) sizes. 10 (M) US to be exact and they are PERFECT. MY 3 year old daughter thinks they are so cute and soft. I’m so happy with this perchace.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: These came with the official Ugg certificate and smelled of magical suede leather as soon as I opened the Ugg box. I got these on sale along with another color and my children absolutely love them. They are cute for around the house and they're adorable with leggings and skinny jeans to run errands!
customer_reviews.author: Dusty & Jennifer Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love them. i wear womens size 5. i bought these in girl size 3 - perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Cute Mocasins!
customer_reviews.text: Received my moccasins in perfect condition,they’re so adorable! Not bad for $40 for legit uggs moccasins! So cute will buy it again soon!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve barely taken them off since getting them. I love them and the color. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: meltol mo333

customer_reviews.title: Great Value if you get the size right.
customer_reviews.text: Saved a bunch buying the kids version. It's risky but the biggest size is roughly equal to a ladies 7.5m, we had a friend bought for daughter then she wore them and loved them. The womens version is well over 100 dollars and really can't tell a difference.
customer_reviews.author: jfab

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes them but will have to wait to grow into it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my wife and she absolutely loves them.👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of this style UGG moccasins. I can wear a 5 in women's sneakers or boots, a 3 in these and Tom's. I love these! So comfortable and even if it may be childish (hehe :P) I love the elephant lining! Something about the way these fit help keep those tiny socks in place, whereas in other shoes I'm constantly stopping to pull them up. I did waterproof spray these to help keep them looking nice longer, and fair warning: when you do that, it does darken the suede some. But I still love them!
customer_reviews.author: JessicaP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are so comfortable I even wear them outside....I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Serina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase...these shoes fit perfect (normally women's 7.5 --purchased kids 6) and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Nill

customer_reviews.title: I love them but I have only had them for about ...
customer_reviews.text: I love them but I have only had them for about a month and haven't really worn them that often and I'm already seeing sign of wear. I also noticed the seam on one of the moccasins wasn't sewed properly when I took them out of the box but I didn't feel like returning them so I kept them. However, a couple of days ago I noticed the sole has started to come apart. I love UGGs for their comfort and so I thought quality. The quality on the shoes was disappointing. Not sure if it's because I got them Amazon but I would definitely be wary in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: You won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.text: If you ever can't find your size in adult shoes rmbr to try the kids section! I used the inch measurement for the size in kids shoes. Turns out 91/2 inches in adults women's is a size 7.5 & in the Big Kids section it's a size 6. These slippers are amazing! Memory foam sides & bottom (under the sheepskin on bottom) makes these the most comfortable slippers ever!
customer_reviews.author: Cynth

customer_reviews.title: Great  shoes
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes them she says they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: CHUB48

customer_reviews.title: Uggs for Life!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves wearing these and they look very handsome!
customer_reviews.author: iShop4Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves these! Fit perfectly and are super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Gouveia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved her UGG shoes they are so comfortable
customer_reviews.author: carol akers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its a gift for my niece and it fits perfectly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Verayo

customer_reviews.title: A must have for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.text: I buy a new pair every year. I use them indoors and out. My only complaint is I wish they made replacement kids footliners, as they don't last too long. The shoe out lasts the liner.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy Radecki

customer_reviews.title: Love UGGS. Shoes are very cute
customer_reviews.text: Love UGGS. Shoes are very cute. I bought them for dress shoes for church on Sunday for my son.
customer_reviews.author: TammyB

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my cousin as a gift and I know she'll love them. Prefect size too
customer_reviews.author: Gaby Muniz

product_meta.title: UGG Kids' K Ryder Jungle Moccasin
product_meta.description: Soft suede moccasin with leather lace
feature_bullets: Upper lined with soft jungle-printed textile
